game.title: Mystery Mansion
game.beginning: You wake up in a dark, deserted mansion and cannot remember how you got there. The only clue is a note that mentions a hidden treasure in the mansion. You must explore the mansion, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth about your own past.
game.ending: After a series of thrilling adventures and mind-bending puzzles, you finally unravel the mystery of the mansion. You discover that the mansion was your childhood home and the hidden treasure is not material wealth but rather your lost memories. With the treasure found, you regain your memories and find closure on your forgotten past.
game.synopsis: Mystery Mansion is an enthralling mystery puzzle game where the protagonist must uncover the secrets of their own past while navigating a treacherous mansion filled with puzzles, traps, and hidden passages.
